price: It is He Who has made the night as a garment[25] for you, and made sleep for rest; and has made daytime for returning to life[26].
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ لِبَاسٗا وَٱلنَّوۡمَ سُبَاتٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورٗا
footnotes:
[25] It covers you in darkness and provides rest.
 [26] To return to your livelihood and activity.
